Name: Horse's Neck with a Kick
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Highball (max 10oz/300ml) glass .
Review: Whiskey and ginger with added shrubbery.
History: A Horse's Neck without a kick (whiskey) is simply ginger ale and bitters. Indeed, that's how this drink was first served, with the "Kick" added sometime around 1910.
Nutrition: One serving of Horse's Neck with a Kick contains 156 calories
